thread.title: Republican debate drew record audience for Fox News
thread.title_full: Republican debate drew record audience for Fox News - MarketWatch

author: By     Steve Goldstein
title: Republican debate drew record audience for Fox News
text: WASHINGTON (MarketWatch) -- The Republican debate drew 24 million viewers to Fox News -- the largest-ever audience in the history of the 21st Century Fox FOX, +4.44% owned broadcaster, according to reports. The participation of real-estate tycoon Donald Trump helped turn the political contest into a highly watched event.
